title: One Piece: The Arabasta Arc, Explained
author: Game Rant Staff
description: Comprehensive analysis of the Arabasta Arc explaining how Baroque Works framed King Cobra for using Dance Powder while Crocodile engineered the drought. Discusses the arc's significance as a turning point for One Piece introducing themes of political uprising and corruption.

title: 20 Things You Didn't Know About The Alabasta Arc In 'One Piece'
author: Anna Lindwasser
description: List-style article discussing lesser-known facts about the Arabasta Arc, including how Dance Powder is based on real-world cloud seeding and includes information from Oda's SBS column about the real-world inspiration.

title: 'One Piece 1100' calls back to a key part of the Arabasta arc
author: We Got This Covered Staff
description: Blog-style article analyzing how Dance Powder created temporary relief but would ultimately worsen the drought, forcing Arabasta citizens to rely on Crocodile. Discusses callbacks to the Arabasta Arc in later chapters.

title: Episode 97 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 97 including plot summary, character appearances, production credits, trivia, and manga correspondence. Notes the episode achieved 14.6% TV rating and includes technical details like the anachronistic Franky theme music.

title: Matsuge - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Character wiki page for Matsuge the camel, including his debut information, physical description, personality traits, role in the Arabasta Arc, and eventual fate. Details his perverted nature and eventual honor of joining the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops.

title: Dance Powder - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Detailed wiki page about Dance Powder including its mechanism, history, role in the Arabasta Arc conspiracy, World Government ban, and real-world inspiration (cloud seeding with silver iodide).

title: Sandora Desert - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Wiki page detailing the Sandora Desert location including its geography, wildlife (Sandora Lizards, Warusagi birds, carnivorous plants, scorpions), climate, and role in the Arabasta Arc.

title: Chapter 162 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 162 'Adventure in the Kingdom of Sand' which Episode 97 is based on. Includes chapter summary, cover story details, and correspondence with the anime adaptation.
